note.p: Career: Tutor to the Princes of Hanover (1690); travelled to Holland, Brabant and England (1691-1693); returned to Hanover (1694); Pastor at Osnabruck (1695); General Superintendent and Chief Court Preacher at Aurich, East Friesland (1698); Pastor of St Peter's, Hamburg (1711)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Jocher (1750); DBI
Notes: Proposed by Sir Robert Southwell
